Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SurfRider911
Reviews.Content: stayed night july 2011 mexico city short business trip hotel clean nice lounge serves buffet style mexican breakfast service personal recommend hotel holiday inn priority club membership valid hotel

Reviews.Title: “Expected more, needs updating”
Reviews.Author: Dagger_TO
Reviews.Content: reading reviews looking forward staying property lobby definitely impressive checkin checkout matter slow struggle add priority club bill entering disappointed fair size wasnt expected looked furniture fixtures ac tv channels snowy found beds soft traffic noise window quiet service food lower rating basically due expectations time due special company change heart rate cant recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Crowne Plaza Mexico City North-Tlalnepantla
HotelInfo.Address: Roberto Fulton 2-A | Ave San Lorenzo, Mexico City 54000, Mexico
